page.title: 12A TYPICAL WEEKEND
page.content: We looked at how the children in our class of 9 and 10 year olds, at St. Georges Primary School, spent a typical weekend from midnight on Friday to midnight on Sunday. We found out that the average child spent 19 hours sleeping, 2 hours on personal hygiene, 4 hours eating, 20 minutes watching T.V. and eating at the same time, 4 hours watching T.V., 2 hours were playing inside, 1 hour resting, 6 hours playing outside, 2 hours for public recreation like swimming, skating and other sports, 4 hours visiting friends and relations, 20 minutes for religion, such as church and Sunday school, and 1 hour was used for shopping.
